abstract: Washington State officials say gunman who killed four people at home in rural Mason County had called police to tell them that he had shot his family, leading to lengthy standoff that ended with his suicide.
lead_paragraph: The authorities negotiated with the man for about three hours before a SWAT team entered the house in a heavily wooded area and found the bodies.

headline.main: Washington State Man Kills His Family and Then Himself
headline.print_headline: Washington State Man Kills His Family and Then Himself

snippet: The authorities negotiated with the man for about three hours before a SWAT team entered the house in a heavily wooded area and found the bodies.
